Replace.Text: Exploring the deformed encounters of the Heart and Blood Demons
Likes civilizations with leading science and culture, hates civilizations that start wars.
For Rhodes Island, for all infected people, for medical science - we must know the answer!
The battlefield is a place that produces nothing but terrible tragedy, and I hope you understand that too.
blood
A mysterious liquid sealed in a clear vial. The viscous and lustrous red is slowly changing its shape in the bottle under your shaking.
Medical Specialization · β and Emergency Reserve and Unstable Plasma

The productivity required for medical operators is halved, and the life recovery of all units is increased by 20 [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Each turn consumes 3 blood points (if any), and all units get a 6 point attack boost.
Builder and manager of the Rhode Island Blood Bank

When you complete the "Writing" technology, you will unlock the construction of the Rhodes Island Blood Bank and related items, and at the same time, a medical operator will be generated in the capital, and the production of medical operators can start. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When there is blood in the blood bank, all units are enhanced.
rhode island
Rhode Island
Rhode Island Pharmaceuticals
warfarin
The battlefield is a place where nothing but horrific tragedy is created, and hopefully those people understand that too.

Warfarin, [race] Sarkaz Gorefiend, [place of birth] Kazdel, [Original Stone Skill Adaptability] excellent[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] in medicine and healing spells He has profound attainments, and jointly established the foundation of the Rhode Island medical system with Dr. Kelsey. Even among the often demonized Sarkaz, the Gorefiend are the most notorious. They walk through the night, feed on other people's blood, kill like hemp, do all kinds of evil... and so on. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] And for these rumors , Miss Warfarin usually responds readily when asked: "Most of my people are like this."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Miss Warfarin's moral values ​​are relatively Be indifferent. As long as she thinks of an idea, she will immediately put it into practice, and she will not take into account the principles of nature and ethics at all. Many operators who joined Rhodes Island have had a sudden blackness in their eyes when they were walking on the road, and then they lay on the operating table when they opened their eyes On the road, there was a horrible experience of strange laughter in my ears.

Medical Operator
Medical Operator
A career that restores life.

Rhodes Island's unique unit, instead of Medics, Rhodes Island provides its employees with good medical and living conditions as well as the most advanced research equipment. Medical Operators have lower costs and less maintenance costs.
Rhode Island Blood Bank
Rhode Island Blood Bank

The blood bank is managed by one of Rhodes Island's oldest members, Dr. Warfarin. [NEWLINE] Rhode Island's physical examination items are completely open to all subjects, and items can be increased or decreased according to the wishes of the subjects. All procedures and processes are completely transparent, and there is no deceptive part. The blood bank has never lost a single blood sample. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]No one can steal a single drop of blood from a Gorefiend.
Rhode Island characteristic building, instead of library +4 [ICON_SCIENCE], Provides two additional citizen slots, and 3 Great Scientist points and blood per turn.

Durin
Uh, blood, blood...your blood...I, I've never smelled so good...I seem to be, bewitched... .!
Just taking care of our people fills up my time...
Can I control the blood-sucking urge? Are you underestimating me! As a professional doctor by training, I can still tell the difference between food and patients!
Then, please take care of me.
Sure enough, I'm still used to thinking alone...
The battlefield is a place that produces nothing but terrible tragedy.
Rare blood types for first aid, it is very difficult to collect these blood types (declaration of war)
Um. Work efficiency seems to have improved.
Sure enough, I'm still used to thinking alone...
There's a first aid kit here, please use this!
In other words, the future work will be more difficult, right?
Hey, you still have time to sleep, really enviable. (condemns you)

I, Warfarin, a specialist in hematology. Compared with ordinary healing spells, I will use the knowledge and experience of hematology to provide you with better medical protection than conventional methods.
Rest assured, everything is ready! (provide city location)
Um. Work efficiency seems to have improved.
Then, please take care of me. (exchange capital position)
Alright, alright, I admit that I have tasted the blood of many races and different types before, and I really enjoy analyzing the differences in their taste...
Hey, what are you doing...
The battlefield is a place that produces nothing but terrible tragedy, and I hope you understand that too.
The medical team is also so nervous, the pressure on the rear troops is really not small (request to move the troops)
Sorry, there are not enough spare potions...
Add saline! Replace the filter! Disinfection of sand tanks and carbon tanks... ok.
Hey, what are you doing...
rhode island
A pharmaceutical company has double the number of Great Scientist points compared to the Academy
training room

The Rhodes Island operator training facilities provide operators with a space for exercise and self-improvement through various training equipment [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Replace the barracks, double the maintenance cost, and convert all citizen money output into production, with double the general points
The Books of "Mr. Blood"
When the project is in progress, a small amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coins and a small amount of [ICON_Science] technology and great scientist points are provided each round
Warfarin's Ideas

When the project is in progress, a small amount of [ICON_Culture] culture is provided each round, and every time the project is completed, the city's population growth rate -20%, warfarin is satisfied [ICON_Production] productivity increases by 10%
blood sample collection

When the project is in progress, a small amount of [ICON_Science] technology is provided each round, and each time the project is completed, the city's science and technology output +20%, and 3 points of blood are provided
